name: World Soccer: Winning Eleven '97
summary:
The first ISS Pro game for the Playstation, with 32 international teams, a choice of 4 stadia, 21 formations & strategies.
With a choice of Exhibition Mode, International League, International Cup, and a Penalty Kick mode.
